The '''Book of Callings''' is an ideal first [[spell book]] for a prospective [[Summoner]].

==Spells==
{{spellbook|Book of Callings}}

==Further Reading==
The [[Book of Summonings]], [[Book of Beasts]], and [[Grand Grimoire]] contain more advanced Summonings spells.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], this book contained [[Call Imp]], [[Summon Lightning Spire]] and [[Summon Ice Beast]], and [[Summoner]]s started with this book.
*Prior to [[0.14]], this book contained [[Summon Scorpions]] instead of Summon Guardian Golem and Summon Lightning Spire.
